thread.title: $83K settlement reached with podiatrist over Medicaid claims
thread.title_full: $83K settlement reached with podiatrist over Medicaid claims - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: $83K settlement reached with podiatrist over Medicaid claims
text:
MONTPELIER, Vt. (AP) - The Vermont attorney general's office says a Rutland podiatrist has agreed to pay the state more than $83,000 to settle claims that he obtained payments from Medicaid that shouldn't have gone to him.
The settlement involving Dr. Frank Buggiani resolves a civil complaint filed in December 2014 by the attorney general's Medicaid Fraud and Residential Abuse Unit. It regarded the submission of Medicaid claims by Buggiani for custom orthotic devices.
The attorney general's office said its investigation showed his claims were at a rate that exceeded the rate charged to other insurers.
Buggiani cooperated with the investigation.
